meanings.definition: A group of extinct mammal-like reptiles.
meanings.sent1: The museum had a fascinating exhibit on cynodonts.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study cynodonts to learn more about ancient creatures.
meanings.sent3: The cynodonts in the museum seemed to be chatting with each other.
meanings.sent4: In the world of dinosaurs, cynodonts were the quiet observers.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the lifelike models of cynodonts.

meanings.sent1: I wonder if that fossil is a cynodonts.
meanings.sent2: The researchers discovered a new species of cynodonts.
meanings.sent3: The cynodonts at the party were the life of the event.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a cynodonts among the giants of the industry.
meanings.sent5: The tiny cynodonts scurried around the prehistoric landscape.
